description.en: Quest Item: Turn these in to get the Key of Kebaras Island.
description.ar: Quest Item: Turn these in to get the Key of Kebaras Island.
description.br: (Quest) Gire para pegar a Chave da Ilha Kebaras.
description.cns: 可从罪恶深重的怪物身上取得，收集起来可减轻罪行。
description.de: (Questitem) Perle von bösen Monstern, um das eigene Karma zu reduzieren.
description.fi: Quest Item: Turn these in to get the Key of Kebaras Island.
description.fil: Quest Item: Turn these in to get the Key of Kebaras Island.
description.fr: Échangez-les pour obtenir la clé de l'Île de Kebaras.
description.id: Item Quest: Serahkan ini untuk mendapatkan Kunci Pulau Kebaras.
description.it: Quest Item: Turn these in to get the Key of Kebaras Island.
description.jp: 凶悪なモンスターから出てくる珠で、これを集めると罪が減る（クエストアイテム）
description.kr: 퀘스트 아이템: 이것을 제출해서 케바라스 섬 출입 열쇠를 획득
description.nl: Quest Item: Turn these in to get the Key of Kebaras Island.
description.pl: Quest Item: Turn these in to get the Key of Kebaras Island.
description.ru: Ключевой предмет: эти бусы можно обменять на ключ острова Кебара.
description.sp: Objeto de Misión: Entrégalos para obtener la llave de la Isla Kebaras.
description.sw: Quest Item: Turn these in to get the Key of Kebaras Island.
description.th: Quest Item: เปิดสิ่งเหล่านี้เพื่อรับกุญแจของเกาะ Kebaras
description.tw: 可從罪惡深重的怪物身上取得，收集起來可減輕罪行。
description.vi: Quest Item: Nộp những thứ này để lấy Chìa khóa của Kebaras Island.
